name: SaveBalon adventure
description:
a happy Blue balloon looking for a way out from the center of a series of traps which surrounded on all sides.
There are a range of stages, and each one harder than the other, you have to be quick and careful. If your movement is wrong you will not succeed in transit.
Balloon is like the ball, play as Football player plays, fly as the bird flies, protect it also as child protects his candy.
Play and get high scores, and be the first.
Remember, do not touch the balloon.
